page.title: 04A SPORTS STADIUM,EDINBURGH.
page.content: This stadium contains a{public {ice-rink,a curling rink and an {International Rugby pitch.} The{ice-rink}has sessions every day and is reasonably priced for the public. { The Murrayfield Racers}are the Edinburgh Ice-Hockey Team. The curling rink is not open to the public,as it belongs to a club. However,many schools in Edinburgh use this rink to practise on,and because of this,many young people have the opportunity to try this sport. The{Scottish Rugby Union}ground opened in 1925 with a match between Scotland and England.Scotland won by 14 points to 11.At present the ground holds 57,000 people.The new West Stand was opened on 26/3/83 by H.R.H.Princess Anne.
